subclassFeature.name: Armor of Light
entries: Also at 1st level, you learn the {@spell Mage Armor} spell, which doesn't count against your number of sorcerer spells known. In addition, you can cast it on yourself by spending 1 or more sorcery points instead of expending a spell slot. When you cast it this way, you gain a number of temporary hitpoints equal to the number of sorcery points you spent plus your Sorcerer level. Once you've cast this spell this way, you can't do so by spending sorcery points again until you finish a short or long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Chosen Blade
entries: At 1st level, you have learned how to manifest a magical weapon. As an action, you can summon this weapon to your hand. You can choose the appearance of the summoned weapon, but it counts as a simple melee weapon worth 1 sp that you are proficient with. It deals {@damage 1d6} radiant damage on a hit. This damage increases as you reach certain levels in this class, to {@damage 1d8} at 6th, {@damage 1d10} at 14th and {@damage 1d12} at 18th level. You use your Charisma instead of your Strength for attack and damage rolls you make with this weapon. You can use your Chosen Blade as your spellcasting focus. You can dismiss it as a bonus action, making it disappear. If another creature tries to pick up your blade, it disappears unless you stabbed it into the ground, in which case only you can lift it.

At 6th level, you can also absorb the magic of one magic melee weapon into your chosen blade by performing a 1 hour ritual while holding the weapon. Your chosen blade gains all magical properties of the other weapon but retains its own shape (e.g., +1 is a magic property, reach is not). The absorbed weapon loses all magic properties until your chosen blade absorbs the magic of another weapon. Your chosen blade can only retain the magic properties of one weapon at a time.

subclassFeature.name: Legendary Spells
entries: Starting at 1st level, you learn additional spells when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown on the table. Each of these spells counts as a sorcerer spell for you, but doesn't count against the number of sorcerer spells you know. Whenever you gain a sorcerer level, you can replace one spell you gained from this feature with another spell of the same level. The new spell must be an abjuration or an evocation spell from the sorcerer, wizard or paladin spell list.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: Starting at 6th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn. Additionally, if you hit a creature with a weapon attack using your chosen blade with your first attack, you can then cast a cantrip with a casting time of 1 action instead of making a second weapon attack.

subclassFeature.name: Punishing Blade
entries: Starting at 14th level, your blade becomes more dangerous. Whenever you hit a creature with a weapon attack with your chosen blade, you can spend 1 sorcery point. If you do, the creature has disadvantage on saving throws made against your spells until the end of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: Chosen Soul
entries: Starting at 18th level, you may unleash the warrior within you. As a bonus action or whenever you summon your chosen blade, you can choose to become an avatar of war. You gain the following benefits for 1 minute:

items: Attacks with your chosen blade score critical hits on 18-20 results, and deal {@damage 3d12} radiant damage instead of {@damage 1d12} damage.
Whenever you would be able to cast a cantrip instead of making a weapon attack, you may cast a spell of 1st level or higher with a casting time of 1 action instead.

entries: Once you have entered into this state, you cannot do so again until you have finished a long rest, unless you spend 5 sorcery points to do so.

table.name: Legendary Origins
rows: You found a sword in a stone. You pulled it out and unlocked an amazing power within you.
You are the reincarnated soul of a lost hero.
A god has chosen you for an epic task.
Your blade is a manifestation of your soul.
A fey gifted you with a beautiful and powerful weapon.
In a moment of desperation, a mysterious weapon appeared in your hands.
